text: thuma qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: 'iina allah taealaa hu aldhy 'ataa musaa altawrat tmamana lnemth ealaa almuhsinin min 'ahl mlth, watafsilana likuli shay' min 'umur dynhm, wahudana wdlalt ealaa altariq almustaqim warahmat lhm; raja' 'an ysddiqu balbeth baed almawt walhisab waljza', wyemlu ldhlk
